products.title: Bella Blackout Tiffany Blue 89mm Vertical Blind
products.description: Their best-selling bella blackout range comes in several colours and features a natural weave effect finish and colour-match blackout backing, perfect for adding style inside and outside your home. This tiffany blue vertical blind adds a soft splash of colour and is also made from blackout fabric, to help blackout the light when desired, making this quality made to measure vertical blind a perfect addition to room that needs optimum light control.

products.title: Bella Blackout Sapphire Blue 89mm Vertical Blind
products.description: This bold bella blackout sapphire blue vertical blind brings cool-toned beautiful blue to your room. This blind reduces light through its blackout properties, making this quality made to measure vertical blind a perfect addition to any room that needs optimum light control. Whether its fully closed, binge-watching the latest riveting tv drama, or letting the light in (but keeping your privacy), their vertical blinds are great for privacy for bedroom, living room or office.

products.title: Bella Blackout Brittany Blue 89mm Vertical Blind

Loved by their customers for its simplicity and value for money, their bella blackout fabrics come in a wide range of colours suitable for all rooms including kitchens and bathrooms. products.title: Origin (Blackout) Navy - Vertical Blind
products.description: Go navy with this rich, dark blue offering from the origin (blackout) range. This is a deep, classic shade that adds a touch of sophistication wherever it's placed, whilst continuing to add the functionality and pragmatism that you will come to expect from the origin range. This dark shade of blue will make white walls look even cleaner and crisper, and this traditional colour scheme can be accented with silver fixtures and fittings in the kitchen, along with light woods and worktops.

products.title: Palermo (Blackout) Bluebell - Vertical Blind
products.description: The soft, lilac-tinted blue of the palermo (blackout) bluebell will raise plenty of questions and get the whole family talking. Is it blue? Or is it dark lilac? It doesn't matter because this shade is so unique and pretty, you'll want it in your home regardless. For maximum impact, set the bluebell against pure white walls and complement with matching accessories throughout the room. Whether you're hoping for summery beauty in the kitchen, a pretty feature colour for a child's bedroom, or something to stand out in your hallway, the bluebell is a must-have.

products.title: Memphis Blue (Blackout)
products.description: Min width: 250mm max width: 5000mm min drop: 500mm max drop: 4000mm fabric composition: polyester louvre width: 89mm guarantee: 12 months fittings: included controls: cord control to open/close and beaded chain to tilt louvres, or wand control to open/close and twist wand to tilt louvres.
